courseDetails: Ilearn provides great experienced faculty for Java .Learners can access and download session recordings and class pdfs and E Note Books .We have live classes running 8hrs on weekends.At the end of each phase we have projects for you which u have to submit before decided time period.Learners can raise their querries and submit tickets for any help
courseDuration: Course duration will be of 20 weeks.In which Learners must have 70% attendence
